name: DIGIS
description:
Founded in 2009 as Do IT Programming Solutions, we have been working hard to deliver high quality at a justified cost.
In 2018, we became DIGIS (or Do IT Global Innovative Solutions) to visualize our dedication to innovations.
Our performance is best of all characterized by the following figures: 9+ yrs. in IT, 180+ successful projects, 80+ clients worldwide, and 98% success rate. 
One of our core competencies is JavaScript, as we believe this technology defines the whole Worldwide Web. As an active JavaScript community member, we start working with new JS libraries as soon as they go live. This approach helped us gain great experience in React Native, React.js, Angular.js, Vue.js, Ember.js, Node.js, Meteor and other frameworks and libraries.
DIGIS promotes your business sustainable growth by delivering the following, world-class services:
a) Mobile Applications Development
Needing an Android or iOS app that can disrupt your business area? Feel free to call us, as we develop cross-platform mobile apps utilizing all innovative approaches and technologies, and possessing a sleek design. It does not matter - Hybrid or Native - we do both. 
b) Web Development
We offer custom web development, website development, mobile portal and website development to build applications, services, and solutions, which are innovative, effective, and easily scalable. 
c) IT Augmented Staffing
In addition to developing software solutions on an outsourcing basis, DIGIS offers rockstar developers to augment our clients’ in-house teams. Our highly skilled, experienced, and readily available IT talents help our clients easily scale their development teams, improve the team’s performance, increase the project flexibility, and reduce development costs.
